alert.note: Alert for Denton; Tarrant; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 7:11PM CDT until June 11 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wise County in north central Texas... Southwestern Denton County in north central Texas... Northwestern Tarrant County in north central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pecan Acres, or near Briar, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Flower Mound, Haltom City, Keller, Watauga, Saginaw, White Settlement, Azle, Trophy Club, River Oaks, Sansom Park, Lake Worth, Eagle Mountain, Briar, Roanoke, Pecan Acres, Westworth Village, Blue Mound, Northlake and Pelican Bay. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 53 and 72. Interstate 30 between mile markers 2 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
